item.title: Updates to the emacs glossary system
item.description: Key bindings kb f L glossary-add-link Create a link for a term to a topic. From then on, that topic’s glossary is loaded when the term is seen. A add-to-glossary-file-for-buffer Add a new term to one of the most relevant glossaries. Creating / adding to the ansible glossary Learning Lord of the Rings lore as I’m reading

item.title: Glossaries for learning in emacs
item.description: Overview of the glossary system Purpose The glossary system is like a wiki system, but more dynamic. Glossaries can be overlain onto anything – books, websites, Facebook conversations, code, etc. The glossary system provides the following abilities: Document-specific glossaries Topic-specific glossaries Visual set functions (Union and difference) for glossaries Highlighting to see what has been entered into the glossary already The glossary system allows me to read, ingest and learn from documents, seeing what I know from a glance.
